name: My Pony Horse Riding - The Horses Racing Game
name_original: My Pony Horse Riding - The Horses Racing Game
description:
Live the dream of having a beautiful pony and dive into fantasy and joy races!

Discover the different ponies and choose the one you prefer! They’re of pure race and look like they’re directly coming out of a story!

Enjoy an animal racing game where the ponies run in a pastoral environment! The mountains, trees and other elements remind the tender horseback rides of when you were young!

The goal is that the pony gets as far as possible to show it is the fastest and to win the respect of the stable!

The controls are really simple! You’ll just have to touch the screen in order to go with your pony!

Watch out with the other ponies that will try to interrupt your progression! Dodge them and try not to crash your pony against them!

The higher your points the higher you’ll be placed in the worldwide leaderboards!

This is a game perfectly adapted to the youngest of the family, the authentic pony amateurs, but also to the adults wanting to have some fun with horse rides!

Features of this pony racing game:

◉ Fantasy and countryside environment!
◉ Beautiful ponies!
◉ Realistic graphics!
◉ Ideal for children!
◉ Worldwide leaderboards!
◉ Funny music!

Try to become better race after race and be the most prestigious pony of the moment! Recommend the game to your friends and see who the best at this game is!

If you’re convinced about downloading the best pony game available, then just go on!

We appreciate the feedbacks from our players in order to keep improving our games! Feel free to let us know any improvement you see and we’ll make sure to answer to your comment!

Let yourself be surprised with the pony’s fantasy!
